mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_no, user_phone, user_contract_no from house_user where (user_no = #{user_no} or user_phone = #{user_phone}) and user_password = #{user_password}
mapper.insert: insert into house_user(user_id, user_no, user_name, user_phone, user_password, user_type, user_contract_no, user_state, user_id_card, user_car_no, user_notes, user_key_no) value (#{user_id}, #{user_no}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_password}, #{user_type}, #{user_contract_no}, #{user_state}, #{user_id_card}, #{user_car_no}, #{user_notes}, #{user_key_no})
mapper.update: update house_user set user_no = #{user_no}, user_name = #{user_name}, user_phone = #{user_phone}, user_password = #{user_password}, user_type = #{user_type}, user_contract_no = #{user_contract_no}, user_state = #{user_state}, user_id_card = #{user_id_card}, user_car_no = #{user_car_no}, user_notes = #{user_notes}, user_key_no = #{user_key_no} where user_id = #{user_id}
